title: England will benefit from extra rest and recovery time - but mindset could be disrupted by match cancellation
text:
The effect of England's game with France being cancelled will come down to the mindset taken by the players and staff. Calling off the game early will have released some stress, without doubt.

The worst thing for players is uncertainty, so it was crucial that a decision on the match was made swiftly and decisively.

It means England have had time to enact a contingency plan. Changing the location and getting the players back to their pre-tournament base of Miyazaki was smart, not just because of the impending typhoon that was due to hit Tokyo, but because they are going back to familiar surroundings where they feel comfortable.

It will allow them to train and ensure they get plenty of time to...
description: The effect of England's game with France being cancelled will come down to the mindset taken by the players and staff.
authors: Sports Medicine Specialist At The Isokinetic Medical Group
